title: Accelerating Federal Permitting of Data Center Infrastructure
summary: The document is an executive order issued by the President on July 23, 2025, titled "Accelerating Federal Permitting of Data Center Infrastructure." The order aims to expedite the development of data center infrastructure, including AI data centers and their supporting components, by easing regulatory burdens and utilizing federally owned land and resources. It defines key terms such as Data Center Project, Covered Components, and Qualifying Project, and outlines initiatives to provide financial support for these projects. The order also streamlines environmental reviews, permitting processes, and the use of federal lands for these projects. Additionally, it revokes a previous executive order (14141) and emphasizes the importance of national security, economic prosperity, and scientific leadership in these efforts.
